src: Jonny Reid, co-pilota della squadra neozelandese dell’A1GP, è entrato oggi nella storia come il più veloce di sempre a guidare sull’Auckland Harbour Bridge, 48 anni, in Nuova Zelanda, in modo legale. Reid è riuscito a condurre sul ponte la vettura di A1GP della Nuova Zelanda, Black Beauty, a velocità superiori ai 160 km/h, per sette volte. A causa dell'assetto molto basso di Black Beauty, la polizia della Nuova Zelanda ha avuto difficoltà a usare le pistole radar per verificare a che velocità viaggiava il signor Reid, ed è riuscita a cronometrarlo una sola volta quando ha rallentato a 160 km/h.
mt: 48 years ago, in New Zealand, Jonny Reid, co-driver of the New Zealand A1GP team, entered the history books as the fastest legal driver ever on the Auckland Harbour Bridge. Reid was able to drive the New Zealand A1GP car, Black Beauty, over the bridge at speeds in excess of 160 km/h, seven times. Due to the very low ride height of Black Beauty, the New Zealand police had difficulty using their radar guns to verify Reid's speed, and were only able to time him once when he slowed to 160 km/h.
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

src: Lunedì un terremoto di lieve entità ha colpito il Montana occidentale alle 22:08. Lo United States Geological Survey (USGS) e il suo National Earthquake Information Center non hanno ricevuto alcun resoconto immediato relativo ad eventuali danni. L'epicentro del terremoto è stato localizzato a circa 20 km (15 miglia) a nord-nord est di Dillon e a circa 65 km (40 miglia) a sud di Butte.
mt: A minor earthquake struck western Montana at 10:08 pm on Monday. The United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center received no immediate reports of damage. The epicenter was located about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.
ref: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

src: Nel corso di una sommossa, la prigione irachena di Abu Ghraib è stata data alle fiamme. Il carcere è divenuto tristemente noto quando sono venuti alla luce gli abusi commessi sui detenuti dopo l'occupazione da parte delle forze statunitensi.
mt: During a riot, the Iraqi prison of Abu Ghraib was set on fire. The prison became infamous when the abuse of detainees after the occupation by US forces came to light.
ref: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.

src: La band ha cancellato il concerto al War Memorial Stadium di Maui a cui avrebbero dovuto partecipare 9.000 persone, scusandosi con i fan. La società che gestisce la band, HK Management Inc., non ha fornito alcuna spiegazione iniziale per motivare la cancellazione del 20 settembre, ma il giorno successivo ha dato la colpa a ragioni logistiche.
mt: 9,000 fans were to attend the concert at the War Memorial Stadium in Maui, but the band cancelled the show, apologizing to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., did not initially give a reason for the September 20 cancellation, but the next day blamed logistical reasons.
ref: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.

src: "Diffuse razzie sarebbero continuate durante la notte, data l'assenza degli agenti delle forze dell'ordine sulle strade di Biškek. Secondo la descrizione di un testimone, Biškek stava sprofondando in uno stato di ""anarchia"", con bande di persone vaganti per le strade a saccheggiare i negozi di prodotti di consumo. Vari residenti di Biškek hanno criticato i manifestanti del sud per le azioni illegali compiute."
mt: "Roving gangs continued to loot during the night, with police absent from the streets of Bishkek. According to the description of a witness, Bishkek was sinking into a state of ""anarchy"", with bands of people roaming the streets looting consumer goods stores. Various residents of Bishkek have criticized the southerners for their illegal actions."
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

src: In precedenza, Jamie Siminoff, amministratore delegato di Ring, ha sottolineato che la società era nata quando ancora non poteva sentire il campanello dal suo negozio in garage. Ha detto di aver costruito un campanello Wi-Fi. Siminoff ha dichiarato che le vendite sono incrementate dopo la sua comparsa nel 2013 in un episodio di Shark Tank, in cui la giuria del programma si è rifiutata di finanziare la startup. Siminoff è comparso sull'emittente televisiva commerciale QVC alla fine del 2017. Ring ha inoltre raggiunto un accordo transattivo con la società concorrente di servizi di sicurezza, la ADT Corporation.
mt: Previously, Jamie Siminoff, Ring's CEO, said the company was born when he couldn't hear the doorbell from his garage store. He said he built a Wi-Fi doorbell. Siminoff said sales increased after his appearance on the 2013 Shark Tank, where the show's panel rejected funding the startup. Siminoff appeared on the QVC shopping network at the end of 2017. Ring also reached a settlement with ADT Corporation, a competitor security services company.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: "Lo spettacolo della PBS ha incassato oltre due dozzine di Emmy Awards e la sua longevità è seconda solo a quella di Sesame Street e Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Ogni episodio si sviluppa attorno al tema di un libro specifico, che viene esplorato attraverso varie storie. Ogni trasmissione inoltre consiglia ai bambini dei libri da cercare quando vanno in biblioteca. John Grant della WNED Buffalo (emittente televisiva di Reading Rainbow) ha dichiarato: ""Reading Rainbow ha insegnato ai bambini l'importanza della lettura… l'amore per la lettura; [il programma] ha invogliato i bambini a prendere un libro e leggere"". src: L'albero, a detta dei funzionari della città di Amsterdam e del museo di Anna Frank, è infestato da un fungo e costituisce un pericolo per la salute pubblica perché, sostengono, correva l'imminente rischio di cadere. Doveva essere abbattuto martedì, ma è stato salvato da una decisione d'urgenza del tribunale.
mt: The tree, according to city officials and the museum of Anne Frank, was infested with a fungus and posed a public health hazard because, they say, it was at imminent risk of falling. It was scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved by an emergency decision from the court.
ref: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

src: "Le associazioni Animal Liberation e Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) stanno di nuovo richiedendo che venga imposto l'obbligo di installare telecamere a circuito chiuso nei mattatoi di tutta l'Australia. Secondo quanto dichiarato dall'ispettore capo della RSPCA del New South Wales, David O'Shannessy, all'ABC, la sorveglianza e il controllo dei mattatoi in Australia dovrebbero essere operazioni ordinarie. ""Le telecamere a circuito chiuso trasmetterebbero senza dubbio un forte messaggio alle persone che lavorano a contatto con gli animali, ovvero che il loro benessere ha la massima priorità""."
mt: "Animal Liberation and Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again asking for the installation of closed circuit cameras in all Australian abattoirs. According to the New South Wales RSPCA chief inspector David O'Shannessy, to ABC, the surveillance and control of abattoirs in Australia should be ordinary operations. ""Closed circuit cameras would undoubtedly send a strong message to people working with animals, that their welfare has the highest priority."""
ref: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

src: Oggi nella comunità di Red Lake, durante i funerali di Jeff Weise e di tre delle nove vittime, si è diffusa la notizia dell'arresto di un altro studente per la sparatoria a scuola avvenuta il 21 marzo. Le autorità non hanno dichiarato molto, a parte la conferma ufficiale dell'arresto di oggi. Una fonte informata sulle indagini ha tuttavia riferito al Minneapolis Star-Tribune che si tratta di Louis Jourdain, figlio sedicenne di Floyd Jourdain, che è il presidente del consiglio della tribù di Red Lake. Al momento non è noto quali accuse saranno rivolte o cosa abbia condotto le autorità al ragazzo, ma al tribunale federale è già iniziato il procedimento minorile.
mt: Today in Red Lake, during the funerals of Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims, news spread of the arrest of another student in connection with the school shooting on March 21. Authorities have not said much, other than confirming the arrest today. An informed source on the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that the arrested student is Louis Jourdain, the 17-year-old son of Floyd Jourdain, the president of the Red Lake tribal council. It is not known what charges will be brought or what led authorities to the boy, but the federal juvenile proceeding has already begun.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: Secondo gli organizzatori della protesta, circa 100.000 persone si sono riversate nelle città della Germania, tra cui Berlino, Colonia, Amburgo e Hannover. La polizia di Berlino ha stimato la presenza di 6.500 manifestanti. Sono state organizzate manifestazioni di protesta anche a Parigi, a Sofia in Bulgaria, a Vilnius in Lituania, a La Valletta a Malta, a Tallinn in Estonia e a Edimburgo e Glasgow in Scozia. Circa 200 persone hanno manifestato a Londra davanti agli uffici di alcuni importanti titolari di diritti d'autore. Il mese scorso, la firma dell'ACTA da parte della Polonia ha scatenato violente proteste, e questo ha portato il governo polacco a decidere, per il momento, di non ratificare l'accordo. Lettonia e Slovacchia hanno rinviato il processo di adesione all'ACTA.
mt: 100,000 people marched in cities across Germany, including Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg and Hanover, according to organizers. Berlin police estimated 6,500 protesters. Protests were also held in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, La Valletta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. About 200 people protested in London outside the offices of some important copyright holders. Last month, Poland's signing of ACTA sparked violent protests, leading the Polish government to decide, for now, not to ratify the agreement. Latvia and Slovakia have postponed the accession process to ACTA.
ref: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.

src: "Sono stati segnalati circa 60 casi di surriscaldamento di iPod malfunzionanti, che hanno causato un totale di sei incendi e causato ustioni di lieve entità a quattro persone. Il Ministero dell'Economia, del Commercio e dell'Industria (METI) giapponese ha affermato di essere a conoscenza di 27 incidenti legati ai dispositivi. La settimana scorsa, il Ministero dell'Economia, del Commercio e dell'Industria (METI) ha annunciato di essere stato informato da Apple di altri 34 incidenti legati al surriscaldamento, che l'azienda ha definito ""non gravi"". Nella sua risposta, il ministero ha definito ""assolutamente deprecabile"" il rinvio del rapporto da parte di Apple."
mt: "There have been about 60 reports of overheating iPods that have caused six fires and minor burns to four people. The Japanese Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said it was aware of 27 incidents involving the devices. Last week, the METI announced it had been informed by Apple of another 34 overheating incidents, which the company called "not serious." In its response, the ministry called Apple's delay in reporting the incidents "absolutely deplorable.""
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

src: Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner, attuale senatrice e first lady argentina, ieri sera ha annunciato la sua candidatura presidenziale a La Plata, città che sorge a 50 chilometri (31 miglia) da Buenos Aires. La Kirchner ha scelto il Teatro Argentino per annunciare la sua intenzione di candidarsi per la presidenza, lo stesso luogo da cui nel 2005 aveva dato il via alla sua campagna elettorale per il Senato come membro della delegazione della provincia di Buenos Aires.
mt: Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner, current senator and first lady of Argentina, yesterday evening announced her presidential candidacy in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires. src: L'ACMA ha stabilito anche che non c'era stata nessuna violazione delle leggi sulla censura relative ai contenuti onlin da parte del Grande Fratello, nonostante il video fosse stato trasmesso in streaming su Internet, perché il materiale non è stato archiviato sul sito web del popolare reality. La legge sui servizi di radiodiffusione (Broadcasting Services Act) dispone che i contenuti di Internet siano regolamentati, ma per essere considerati contenuti Internet, devono risiedere fisicamente su un server.
mt: The ACMA also found that there was no breach of the online content censorship laws by Big Brother, despite the video being streamed online, because the material was not archived on the website of the popular reality show. The Broadcasting Services Act stipulates that Internet content is regulated, but for it to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.
ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

src: "Il tesoriere australiano Peter Costello, che molto probabilmente subentrerà al primo ministro John Howard nella guida del partito liberale, ha appoggiato un'industria nucleare australiana. Costello ha affermato che quando la produzione di energia nucleare diventerà sostenibile in termini economici, l'Australia non dovrebbe demordere nel puntare al suo utilizzo. ""Se diventerà economicamente vantaggiosa, la dovremmo avere. Questo significa che non abbiamo obiezioni in linea di principio all'energia nucleare"", ha dichiarato Costello."
mt: "Australian Treasurer Peter Costello, who is likely to replace Prime Minister John Howard as leader of the Liberal Party, has backed an Australian nuclear industry. Costello said that when nuclear power production becomes economically viable, Australia should not shy away from pursuing its use. ""If it becomes economically viable, we should have it. That means we have no principled objection to nuclear power"", Costello said."
ref: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

src: Con soltanto diciotto medaglie disponibili ogni giorno, un buon numero di Paesi non ce l'ha fatta a salire sul podio. Tra questi, l'Olanda con Anna Jochemsen piazzata al nono posto nella classifica femminile nel Super-G di ieri, e la Finlandia con Katja Saarinen piazzata al decimo posto nella stessa classifica. L'australiano Mitchell Gourley ha ottenuto l'undicesimo posto nel Super-G maschile, mentre l'avversario ceco Oldrich Jelinek ha ottenuto sedicesimo posto nella stessa specialità. Il messicano Arly Velasquez ha concluso al quindicesimo posto nel Super-G seduto maschile. Nel Super-G in piedi maschile è arrivato nono il neozelandese Adam Hall. Lo sciatore polacco non vedente Maciej Krezel e la sua guida Anna Ogarzynska si sono classificati al tredicesimo posto nel Super-G. Il sudcoreano Jong Seork Park si è classificato al ventiquattresimo posto nel Super-G maschile.
mt: 18 medals are available each day, and a number of countries failed to make the podium. Among them, the Netherlands with Anna Jochemsen placed ninth in the women's Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen placed tenth in the same classification. The Australian Mitchell Gourley placed eleventh in the men's Super-G, while the Czech opponent Oldrich Jelinek placed sixteenth in the same discipline. The Mexican Arly Velasquez placed fifteenth in the seated men's Super-G. In the standing men's Super-G, New Zealand's Adam Hall placed ninth. The blind Polish skier Maciej Krezel and his guide Anna Ogarzynska placed thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park placed twenty-fourth in the men's Super-G.
ref: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

L'australiano Mitchell Gourley ha ottenuto l'undicesimo posto nel Super-G maschile, mentre l'avversario ceco Oldrich Jelinek ha ottenuto sedicesimo posto nella stessa specialità. Il messicano Arly Velasquez ha concluso al quindicesimo posto nel Super-G seduto maschile. Nel Super-G in piedi maschile è arrivato nono il neozelandese Adam Hall. Lo sciatore polacco non vedente Maciej Krezel e la sua guida Anna Ogarzynska si sono classificati al tredicesimo posto nel Super-G. Il sudcoreano Jong Seork Park si è classificato al ventiquattresimo posto nel Super-G maschile.
mt: 18 medals are available each day, and a number of countries failed to make the podium. Among them, the Netherlands with Anna Jochemsen placed ninth in the women's Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen placed tenth in the same classification. The Australian Mitchell Gourley placed eleventh in the men's Super-G, while the Czech opponent Oldrich Jelinek placed sixteenth in the same discipline. The Mexican Arly Velasquez placed fifteenth in the seated men's Super-G. In the standing men's Super-G, New Zealand's Adam Hall placed ninth. The blind Polish skier Maciej Krezel and his guide Anna Ogarzynska placed thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park placed twenty-fourth in the men's Super-G.
ref: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

src: "Il processo è avvenuto presso la Corte della Corona di Birmingham e si è concluso il 3 agosto. Il presentatore, arrestato sulla scena del crimine, ha negato l'attacco sostenendo di essersi servito del palo per proteggersi dal lancio di bottiglie da parte di una trentina di persone. Blake è stato incriminato anche per aver cercato di sovvertire il corso della giustizia. Rivolgendosi a Blake, il giudice ha affermato che era ""quasi inevitabile"" che finisse in prigione."
mt: "The trial took place at the Court of the Crown of Birmingham and ended on August 3. The presenter, arrested at the scene of the crime, denied the attack by claiming he used the pole to protect himself from the throwing of bottles by about thirty people. Blake was also charged with trying to subvert the course of justice. Addressing Blake, the judge said it was ""almost inevitable"" that he would end up in prison."
ref: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."

src: Gli altri argomenti in calendario a Bali includono il salvataggio delle ultime foreste superstiti nel mondo e la condivisione di tecnologie per supportare la crescita delle nazioni in via di sviluppo secondo modelli meno inquinanti. L'ONU auspica inoltre di giungere alla creazione di un fondo che aiuti i Paesi colpiti dal riscaldamento globale a fronteggiarne gli impatti. Il denaro potrebbe essere usato per la costruzione di case resistenti alle inondazioni, per migliorare la gestione dell'acqua e per diversificare le colture.
mt: Other issues on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's last remaining forests and sharing technologies to support the growth of developing nations in less-polluting models. The U.N. also hopes to create a fund to help countries hit by global warming to cope with its impacts. The money could be used to build flood-resistant homes, improve water management and diversify crops.
ref: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.

src: "La Nigeria ha precedentemente annunciato di voler aderire all’AfCFTA nella settimana che precede il vertice. Albert Muchanga, commissario dell'Unione africana per il Commercio e l'Industria, ha dichiarato che il Benin avrebbe aderito. Ha dichiarato: ""Non abbiamo ancora definito regole d’origine e concessioni tariffarie, ma abbiamo un quadro sufficiente per iniziare a fare trading il 1° luglio 2020""."
mt: "Nigeria has previously announced its intention to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. Albert Muchanga, Commissioner of the African Union for Trade and Industry, said Benin would join. He said: ""We have not yet defined rules of origin and tariff concessions, but we have a sufficient framework to start trading on July 1, 2020."""
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: Durante la sua permanenza ad Atlanta è stata acclamata dalla critica e le è stato riconosciuto un ruolo importante nell'educazione urbana innovativa. Nel 2009 le è stato assegnato il titolo di Sovrintendente nazionale dell'anno. Al momento dell'assegnazione del premio, i punteggi dei test nelle scuole di Atlanta avevano registrato un notevole miglioramento. Subito dopo, l'Atlanta Journal-Constitution ha pubblicato un resoconto in cui erano evidenziati alcuni problemi relativi ai risultati della prova. Dal rapporto emergeva che i punteggi dei test erano migliorati in modo incredibilmente veloce e che la scuola aveva rilevato anomalie interne, senza però intervenire di conseguenza. Successivamente, le prove hanno fornito indicazioni circa l'alterazione dei documenti degli esami e la Hall, insieme ad altri 34 funzionari scolastici, è stata incriminata nel 2013.
mt: During her tenure in Atlanta, she was lauded by the press and recognized for her role in innovative urban education. In 2009, she was named National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, test scores in Atlanta schools had shown significant improvement. Immediately after, the Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report highlighting some problems with the test results. The report showed that test scores had improved at an incredibly fast rate and that the school had identified internal anomalies, without taking any action. Subsequently, the tests revealed evidence of altered test documents and Hall, along with 34 other school officials, was indicted in 2013.
ref: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.

src: All'esterno dell'ufficio del governatore generale è esplosa una bomba. Nel giro di due ore sono esplose altre tre bombe nelle vicinanze degli edifici governativi. Secondo alcuni resoconti, il numero ufficiale delle vittime è pari a otto e i report ufficiali confermano che ci sono stati fino a 30 feriti, anche se i numeri definitivi non sono ancora noti.
mt: A bomb exploded outside the governor-general's office. In the next two hours, three more bombs exploded near government buildings. Official reports say eight people were killed and up to 30 were injured, but the final numbers are not yet known.
ref: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.

src: Intorno alle 10 di questa mattina, ora locale, si è verificato il crollo di un ostello alla Mecca, la città santa islamica. L'edificio ospitava numerosi pellegrini giunti in visita alla città santa alla vigilia dello hajj. L'ostello ospitava principalmente cittadini provenienti dagli Emirati Arabi Uniti. Il numero di deceduti ammonta ad almeno 15, una cifra che si prevede aumenterà.
mt: Around 10 am local time, a hostel in Mecca, the Islamic holy city, collapsed. The building housed many pilgrims who had come to visit the holy city before the hajj. The hostel housed mainly citizens from the United Arab Emirates. The number of dead is at least 15, a figure that is expected to increase.
ref: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.

src: La collisione tra i satelliti, entrambi aventi un peso superiore alle 1.000 libbre e una velocità di circa 17.500 miglia all'ora, è avvenuta a 491 miglia dalla Terra. Gli scienziati sostengono che la collisione ha provocato un'esplosione imponente. Stanno ancora cercando di determinare la dimensione dello schianto e che conseguenze avrà sulla Terra. Il Comando Strategico statunitense dell'ufficio del Dipartimento della Difesa degli Stati Uniti sta tenendo traccia dei detriti. Il risultato dell'analisi dei tracciati sarà pubblicato su un sito web pubblico.
mt: The collision between the two satellites, both weighing more than 1,000 pounds and traveling at about 17,500 miles per hour, occurred 491 miles from Earth. Scientists say the collision produced a large explosion. They are still trying to determine the size of the crash and what effect it will have on Earth. The U.S. Department of Defense is tracking the debris. The results of the analysis of the tracks will be published on a public website.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

src: "Il Governatore della California, Arnold Schwarzenegger, ha convertito in legge il decreto secondo cui la vendita o il noleggio di videogiochi con contenuti violenti sono vietati ai minori. Il disegno di legge prevede che sui videogiochi violenti venduti nello Stato della California sia apposta un'etichetta con su scritto ""18"" e ne rende punibile la vendita ai minori con una multa da 1.000 dollari a violazione."
mt: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger has signed a bill into law that prohibits the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires that violent video games sold in California be labeled ""18"" and prohibits their sale to minors with a fine of $1,000 per violation."
ref: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading ""18"" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense."

src: "Duvall, sposato con due figli adulti, non ha destato un grande interesse in Miller, a cui ha raccontato la storia. Alla richiesta di un commento, Miller ha risposto: ""Mike parla molto durante l'udienza… Io mi stavo preparando per cui non ascoltavo quello che lui diceva""."
mt: "Duvall, married with two adult children, didn't get much of a reaction from Miller, who was listening to Duvall's story. When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing... I was preparing myself so I wasn't listening to what he was saying.""
ref: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

src: "Dopo l'incontro di martedì durato 25 minuti con il leader dell'NDP Jack Layton nel PMO, il primo ministro Stephen Harper si è detto d'accordo a sottoporre il 'Clean Air Act' del governo al riesame di un comitato composto da tutte le parti in preparazione della seconda lettura. In occasione dell'incontro con il Primo Ministro, Layton aveva richiesto alcuni emendamenti al progetto di legge ambientale del Partito conservatore, sollecitandone una ""riscrittura accurata e completa"". Dacché il governo federale è intervenuto rilevando il finanziamento dell'ospedale Mersey di Devonport, in Tasmania, il governo statale e diversi deputati hanno criticato la misura come uno stratagemma preelettorale in vista delle consultazioni federali in calendario a novembre. Il primo ministro John Howard ha tuttavia dichiarato che l'obiettivo del gesto, grazie a una donazione extra di 45 milioni di dollari australiani, era solo quello di proteggere le strutture dell'ospedale dal declassamento ad opera del governo tasmano."
mt: "After a 25-minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton in the PMO on Tuesday, Prime Minister Stephen Harper agreed to submit the government's 'Clean Air Act' to a committee composed of all parties in preparation for the second reading. During the meeting with the Prime Minister, Layton had requested some amendments to the Conservative Party's environmental bill, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewrite"". Since the federal government has intervened to take over the funding of the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and several MPs have criticized the measure as a pre-election ploy. Prime Minister John Howard, however, declared that the goal of the gesture, thanks to an extra donation of 45 million Australian dollars, was only to protect the hospital's facilities from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government."
ref: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."

src: Nei campioni di urina domestici deceduti dopo aver mangiato cibo per animali contaminato, sono state trovate tracce sia di acido cianurico e che di melamina. I ricercatori dell'università hanno affermato che i due composti reagiscono tra loro formando dei cristalli che possono ostacolare la funzionalità renale. I ricercatori hanno rilevato nell'urina dei gatti la formazione di cristalli, dovuti all'aggiunta di melamina e acido cianurico. Al confronto mediante spettroscopia infrarossa (FT-IR), la composizione di questi cristalli corrisponde a quella individuata nell'urina degli animali da compagnia che ne sono colpiti.
mt: In urine samples from cats that died after eating contaminated pet food, traces of cyanuric acid and melamine were found. Researchers at the university said the two compounds react with each other to form crystals that can interfere with kidney function. Researchers found crystals in the urine of cats, due to the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. At the comparison by infrared spectroscopy (FT-IR), the composition of these crystals corresponds to that found in the urine of companion animals affected.
ref: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said. The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

src: "Xinhua ha riferito che gli inquirenti del governo mercoledì hanno recuperato due 'scatole nere' con le registrazioni di volo. Anche i suoi compagni di wrestling hanno voluto rendere omaggio a Luna. Tommy Dreamer ha dichiarato: ""Luna è stata la prima Regina dell'Estremo. Il mio primo manager. È morta nella notte delle due lune. Unico, esattamente come lei. Una donna forte."" ""Luna era stramba come me… Forse anche di più… Le voglio bene e mi mancherà… Speriamo che sia in un posto migliore"", è stato il commento di Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels."
mt: "Xinhua reported that government investigators on Wednesday recovered two "black boxes" with flight recordings. Even his wrestling colleagues wanted to pay tribute to Luna. src: Nessuna delle tre persone che si trovavano in casa al momento dello schianto dell'auto è rimasta ferita. Ciò nonostante, il conducente è rimasto gravemente ferito alla testa. La strada in cui è avvenuto l'incidente è stata chiusa temporaneamente, mentre i servizi di soccorso liberavano il conducente dalla Audi TT rossa. È stato inizialmente ricoverato al James Paget Hospital di Great Yarmouth. È stato poi trasferito all'Addenbrooke's Hospital di Cambridge.
mt: None of the three people in the house at the time of the crash were injured. However, the driver was seriously injured to the head. The road where the accident occurred was temporarily closed, while rescue services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially admitted to the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was then transferred to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
ref: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt. However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head. The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.

src: "Oggi alle 10:00 il tempo era magnifico quando sono iniziate le partite e, nonostante una spruzzata di pioggia a metà mattinata durata pochissimo, è stata una giornata perfetta per il rugby a 7. Il Sudafrica, prima testa di serie del torneo, è partito con il piede giusto ottenendo una facile vittoria contro lo Zambia (26 - 00), quinta testa di serie. Nonostante sembrasse piuttosto arrugginito nella partita contro le ""sorelle"" del sud, il Sudafrica ha comunque migliorato in modo costante le proprie prestazioni nel corso del torneo. Le ha distinte la difesa disciplinata, l'abilità di maneggiare la palla e l'eccellente lavoro di squadra. Era chiaro che erano loro la squadra da battere."
mt: "Today at 10:00 the weather was magnificent when the matches began and, despite a brief shower in the middle of the morning that lasted only a short time, it was a perfect day for rugby sevens. South Africa, the first seed of the tournament, started with the right foot getting an easy victory against Zambia (26 - 00), the fifth seed. Despite seeming rather rusty in the match against the "sisters" of the south, South Africa has nevertheless improved steadily throughout the tournament. They were distinguished by disciplined defense, the ability to handle the ball and excellent teamwork. It was clear that they were the team to beat."
ref: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.

src: Ufficialmente la Cina continua a essere uno stato comunista; ciononostante, negli ultimi trent'anni la Cina ha sviluppato un'economia di mercato. Sotto il governo di Deng Xiaoping furono avviate le prime riforme economiche. Da allora, il volume dell'economia cinese è aumentato di 90 volte. Lo scorso anno, per la prima volta, la Cina ha esportato più automobili della Germania e ha sorpassato gli Stati Uniti diventando il maggiore mercato del settore. Entro due decenni il PIL della Cina potrebbe essere superiore a quello degli Stati Uniti.
mt: Officially, China remains a communist state; however, in the last thirty years, China has developed a market economy. Under the government of Deng Xiaoping, the first economic reforms were initiated. Since then, the volume of the Chinese economy has increased by 90 times. Last year, for the first time, China exported more automobiles than Germany and surpassed the United States to become the largest market in the sector. Within two decades, China's GDP could be greater than that of the United States.
ref: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.

src: """Ci sforzeremo di tagliare le emissioni di diossido di carbonio per unità di PIL di un margine notevole entro il 2020, rispetto ai livelli del 2005"", ha affermato Hu. Non ha stabilito un valore preciso della riduzione, affermando che essa dipenderà dalla produttività economica cinese. Hu ha invitato i Paesi in via di sviluppo a ""evitare la vecchia strada di inquinare prima e ripulire poi"". Ha anche aggiunto che non dovrebbero, comunque, essere costretti ad assumersi degli obblighi che trascendono la loro fase di sviluppo, come pure le loro responsabilità e competenze."
mt: """We will strive to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a considerable margin by 2020, compared with 2005 levels,"" Hu said. He did not set a specific reduction target, saying it would depend on China's economic productivity. Hu invited developing countries to ""avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He also added that they should not, however, be forced to assume obligations that transcend their stage of development, as well as their responsibilities and capabilities."
ref: """We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""

src: "Leonov, conosciuto anche come ""cosmonauta n. 11"", era un membro del team originario di astronauti dell’Unione Sovietica. Il 18 marzo 1965 fu il primo a compiere un'attività extraveicolare con equipaggio (EVA), o ""passeggiata nello spazio"", restando da solo al di fuori della capsula per poco più di dodici minuti. Per il suo lavoro ha ricevuto la più importante onorificenza dell'Unione Sovietica, il riconoscimento ""Eroe dell'Unione Sovietica"". Dieci anni più tardi fu a capo della parte sovietica della missione Apollo-Soyuz, che simboleggiava la fine della corsa allo spazio."
mt: "Leonov, also known as "cosmonaut no. 11", was a member of the original team of Soviet astronauts. On March 18, 1965, he was the first to perform an extravehicular activity (EVA), or "space walk", remaining alone outside the capsule for more than twelve minutes. For his work he received the most important award of the Soviet Union, the "Hero of the Soviet Union" award. Ten years later he led the Soviet part of the Apollo-Soyuz mission, which symbolized the end of the space race."
ref: "Leonov, also known as ""cosmonaut No. 11"", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or ""spacewalk"", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes. He received the ""Hero of the Soviet Union"", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over."

src: "Gibson, dopo l’incidente, è stato portato in ospedale, ma è morto poco dopo. Il camionista, che ha 64 anni, è uscito illeso dallo scontro. Il veicolo coinvolto è stato rimosso dalla scena dell'incidente il giorno stesso, attorno alle 12:00 GMT. Una persona che lavorava in un'autofficina vicino al luogo dell'incidente ha dichiarato: ""C'erano bimbi che aspettavano per attraversare la strada, tutti urlavano in lacrime"". Rientrarono tutti dal luogo in cui era avvenuto l'incidente."
mt: "Gibson, after the accident, was taken to the hospital, but died shortly after. The truck driver, who is 64 years old, was unharmed in the crash. The vehicle involved was removed from the scene of the accident the same day, around 12:00 GMT. A person who worked in a nearby auto repair shop said: ""There were children waiting to cross the street, everyone was screaming in tears."" They all returned from the scene of the accident."
ref: "After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day. A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: ""There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" They all ran back from where the accident had happened."

src: "L'attività svolta è stata per lo più teorica, ma il programma è stato scritto per simulare i rilievi effettuati della galassia del Sagittario. L'effetto cercato dal team doveva essere provocato dalle forze mareali tra la materia oscura di questa galassia e la materia oscura della Via Lattea. Così come la Luna esercita una forza di attrazione sulla Terra che genera le maree, anche la Via Lattea esercita una forza sulla galassia del Sagittario. Gli scienziati hanno potuto desumere che gli effetti della materia oscura su altra materia oscura sono gli stessi effetti che ha la materia ""normale"". Questa teoria sostiene che gran parte della materia oscura intorno a una galassia è raccolta in una specie di alone, formato da una moltitudine di piccole particelle."
mt: "The work was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate the observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect sought by the team was caused by tidal forces between the dark matter of this galaxy and the dark matter of the Milky Way. Just as the Moon exerts a force of attraction on the Earth that generates tides, the Milky Way exerts a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. Scientists were able to infer that the effects of dark matter on other dark matter are the same effects that normal matter has. This theory suggests that most of the dark matter around a galaxy is collected in a kind of halo, formed by a multitude of small particles."
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. src: "Quando la capsula raggiungerà la Terra ed entrerà nell'atmosfera, verso le 05:00 (orario della costa est), si prevede che gli abitanti della California settentrionale, dell'Oregon, del Nevada e dello Utah assisteranno ad un notevole spettacolo di luci. L'aspetto della capsula sarà molto simile a quello di una stella cadente che passa nel cielo. La capsula viaggerà a una velocità di circa 12,8 km o 8 miglia al secondo, tale da coprire in un minuto la distanza tra Los Angeles da San Francisco. Stardust fisserà un nuovo record storico per essere il veicolo spaziale più veloce a rientrare sulla Terra, superando il record precedente raggiunto nel maggio 1969 durante il ritorno del modulo di comando Apollo 10. Tom Duxbury, project manager di Stardust, ha affermato: ""Si muoverà sopra la costa occidentale della California settentrionale e illuminerà il cielo partendo dalla California, attraversando Oregon centrale, Nevada e Idaho fino a raggiungere lo Utah""."
mt: "When the capsule reaches the Earth and enters the atmosphere, around 5:00 a.m. (Pacific time), residents of northern California, Oregon, Nevada and Utah will witness a spectacular light show. The appearance of the capsule will be very similar to that of a falling star passing through the sky. The capsule will travel at a speed of about 12.8 kilometers or 8 miles per second, covering in a minute the distance between Los Angeles and San Francisco. Stardust will set a new historical record as the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, surpassing the previous record set in May 1969 during the return of the Apollo 10 command module. Tom Duxbury, Stardust project manager, said: ""It will move over the west coast of northern California and light up the sky starting in California, crossing central Oregon, Nevada and Idaho to reach Utah."""
ref: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.

src: Le autorità dell'Ohio riferiscono che un medico che lavorava all'ospedale pediatrico di Pittsburgh, in Pennsylvania, sarà accusato di omicidio aggravato in seguito al ritrovamento del corpo senza vita di sua madre nel bagagliaio dell'auto della donna avvenuto mercoledì. La dottoressa Malar Balasubramanian, 29, è stata ritrovata in Ohio, a Blue Ash, un sobborgo a circa 15 miglia a nord di Cincinnati, riversa a terra accanto alla strada con addosso una maglietta e l'intimo, apparentemente sotto l'effetto di farmaci. Ha indirizzato gli agenti verso la sua vecchia Oldsmobile Intrigue nera che si trovava a 500 piedi di distanza. Lì, avvolto in coperte sporche di sangue, è stato rinvenuto il corpo di Saroja Balasubramanian, 53 anni. Secondo la polizia, il corpo sembrava essere lì da un giorno circa.
mt: Authorities in Ohio report a doctor who worked at a Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, children's hospital will be charged with aggravated murder after the body of her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Ohio, in Blue Ash, a suburb about 15 miles north of Cincinnati, lying on the ground next to the road wearing a T-shirt and underwear, apparently under the influence of drugs. She directed police to her old black Oldsmobile Intrigue, which was 500 feet away. There, wrapped in bloody sheets, was the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53. According to police, the body appeared to have been there for about a day.
ref: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state. She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away. There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets. Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.

src: Al termine dei combattimenti, una volta trasportati i feriti in ospedale, circa 40 dei restanti detenuti rimasero nel piazzale, rifiutandosi di tornare nelle loro celle. I negoziatori hanno cercato di risolvere la situazione, però le richieste dei detenuti sono poco chiare. Tra le 22:00 e le 23:00 MDT i detenuti hanno appiccato un incendio nel cortile. Poco dopo, agenti in tenuta antisommossa sono entrati nel cortile e hanno stretto in un angolo i detenuti utilizzando gas lacrimogeni. Le squadre antincendio alla fine sono riuscite a domare il fuoco alle 23:35.
mt: 40 of the remaining inmates refused to return to their cells after the fighting was over, and negotiations were held to resolve the situation. The inmates' demands were unclear. Between 10:00 and 11:00 PM MDT, inmates set fire to the courtyard. Shortly after, riot police entered the courtyard and cornered the inmates using tear gas. Firefighters eventually put out the fire at 11:35 PM.
ref: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear. Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard. Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas. Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.

src: "I commenti, in diretta televisiva, hanno rappresentato la prima occasione per autorevoli fonti iraniane per ammettere che le sanzioni sono efficaci. Esse comprendono limitazioni finanziarie e il divieto dell'Unione europea all'esportazione di petrolio greggio, che rappresenta l'80% del reddito estero nell'economia dell'Iran. Secondo l'ultimo rapporto mensile dell’OPEC, il volume delle esportazioni di greggio è sceso al livello più basso degli ultimi vent'anni, con 2,8 milioni di barili al giorno. Il leader supremo del Paese, l’Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, ha parlato della dipendenza dal petrolio paragonandola ad ""una trappola"" che risale al periodo precedente la rivoluzione islamica iraniana del 1979 e dalla quale il Paese si dovrebbe liberare."
mt: "The comments, on live television, were the first opportunity for senior Iranian sources to admit that sanctions are effective. They include financial restrictions and the European Union ban on crude oil exports, which represents 80 percent of Iran's foreign revenue in its economy. According to the latest monthly report from the OPEC, the volume of oil exports has fallen to the lowest level in the last twenty years, with 2.8 million barrels a day. The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has spoken of the dependence on oil as ""a trap"" that goes back to the period before the Iranian Islamic revolution of 1979 and from which the country should be freed."
ref: "The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect. They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income. In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day. The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as ""a trap"" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself."

src: In Francia, il voto è tradizionalmente un’esperienza poco tecnologica: gli elettori entrano in una cabina isolata e mettono in una busta un foglio prestampato che indica il candidato prescelto. Dopo la verifica della sua identità da parte dei funzionari, l'elettore deposita la busta nell'urna e firma il registro elettorale. La legge elettorale francese codifica le procedure in modo alquanto rigoroso. Dal 1988 le urne elettorali devono essere trasparenti, di modo che elettori e osservatori possano testimoniare che all'inizio della votazione non sono presenti buste e che non ne vengano inserite altre oltre a quelle degli elettori, debitamente conteggiati e autorizzati. I candidati possono inviare dei loro rappresentanti per assistere a ogni fase del processo. Di sera, i volontari effettuano il computo dei voti sotto rigido controllo, conformemente alle procedure specifiche.
mt: In France, voting is traditionally a low-tech experience: voters enter an isolated booth and put a pre-printed slip indicating their chosen candidate into a ballot box. After verifying the voter's identity, the voter deposits the ballot box into the ballot box and signs the electoral register. The French electoral law codifies the procedures in a rather rigorous way. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent, so that voters and observers can testify that at the beginning of the vote there are no ballots and that no others are inserted other than those of the voters, duly counted and authorized. Candidates can send their representatives to assist in every phase of the process. In the evening, volunteers count the votes under strict control, in accordance with specific procedures.
ref: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope. After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll. French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters. Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.

src: I reportage televisivi mostrano il fumo bianco che fuoriesce dall'impianto. Le autorità locali stanno allertando le persone residenti nei pressi della centrale a rimanere in casa, a spegnere i condizionatori e a non bere l'acqua del rubinetto. In base alle dichiarazioni dell'agenzia nucleare del Giappone, sono stati rilevati cesio e iodio radioattivi presso l'impianto. L'ipotesi delle autorità è che questo indichi una rottura e una conseguente perdita dei contenitori di combustibile all'uranio nel sito.
mt: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant. Local authorities are warning residents near the plant to stay indoors, turn off air conditioners and not drink tap water. According to the Japan Atomic Energy Agency, cesium and radioactive iodine have been detected at the plant. Authorities believe this indicates a breach and subsequent loss of fuel containers at the site.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant. Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water. According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant. Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: "Il dottor Tony Moll ha individuato la tubercolosi estensivamente resistente ai farmaci (XDR-TB) nella provincia sudafricana di KwaZulu-Natal. Secondo una dichiarazione rilasciata in un'intervista, questa nuova variante era ""altamente preoccupante e allarmante, per via dell’elevato tasso di mortalità"". Secondo il dottor Moll alcuni pazienti potrebbero aver contratto il microbo all'interno dell'ospedale, e almeno due di essi erano operatori sanitari dell'ospedale stesso. Nel corso di un anno una persona infetta può arrivare a contagiare da 10 a 15 contatti stretti. Ciononostante, la percentuale di XDR-TB nell'intero gruppo di persone affette da tubercolosi pare ancora bassa; 6.000 su un totale di 330.000 persone infette in un dato momento in Sudafrica."
mt: "Dr. Tony Moll has identified extensively drug-resistant tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African province of KwaZulu-Natal. According to a statement released in an interview, this new variant was ""highly concerning and alarming, because of the high mortality rate"". According to Dr. Moll some patients may have contracted the microbe within the hospital, and at least two of them were hospital staff. In the course of a year an infected person can infect from 10 to 15 close contacts. Nevertheless, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people affected by tuberculosis still seems low; 6,000 out of a total of 330,000 infected people in South Africa."
ref: "Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal. In an interview, he said the new variant was ""very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."" Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers. In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa."

src: Secondo la FAA, il sistema NextGen permetterebbe agli aerei di coprire rotte più brevi e di risparmiare milioni di galloni di carburante all'anno, riducendo così le emissioni di anidride carbonica. Il sistema impiega la tecnologia satellitare anziché quella obsoleta basata sui radar da terra, per permettere ai controllori del traffico aereo di localizzare i velivoli con maggiore precisione e fornire ai piloti informazioni più accurate.
mt: According to the FAA, the NextGen system would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel per year, reducing carbon dioxide emissions. The system uses satellite technology instead of the outdated ground-based radar to allow air traffic controllers to locate aircraft more precisely and provide pilots with more accurate information.
ref: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions. It uses satellite-based technology as opposed to older ground-radar-based technology to allow air traffic controllers to pinpoint aircraft with greater precision and give pilots more accurate information.

src: Gli storici criticano le politiche del passato dell’FBI sostenendo che abbia concentrato le risorse su casi facili da risolvere, in particolare i furti di auto, allo scopo di aumentare il tasso di successo dell’agenzia. L'iniziativa contro le oscenità è stata finanziata dal Congresso a partire dall'anno fiscale 2005, con la specifica richiesta all'FBI di assegnare 10 agenti alla pornografia per adulti.
mt: Historians criticize the FBI's past policies, saying it focused its resources on easy-to-solve cases, particularly car thefts, to boost the agency's success rate. The anti-obscenity initiative was funded by Congress starting in the 2005 fiscal year, with the specific request to the FBI to assign 10 agents to pornography.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Il JAS 39C Gripen è precipitato su una pista di atterraggio alle 9:30 circa, ora locale (02:30 UTC), ed è esploso, con la conseguente chiusura dell’aeroporto ai voli commerciali. L'identificazione del pilota ha rivelato che si trattava del capo squadriglia Dilokrit Pattavee. I media locali riferiscono che durante l'intervento un veicolo aeroportuale antincendio si è ribaltato.
mt: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed on a runway at around 9:30 local time (02:30 UTC), and exploded, causing the airport to close to commercial flights. The pilot's identity was revealed to be the squadron leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media report that during the operation a fire truck overturned.
ref: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.

src: Nel corso degli anni '60, Brzezinski fu il consigliere di John F. Kennedy e successivamente dell'amministrazione Lyndon B. Johnson. Nel corso delle elezioni del 1976, consigliò Carter in materia di politica estera per poi ricoprire il ruolo di Consigliere per la sicurezza nazionale (NSA) dal 1977 al 1981, subentrando a Henry Kissinger. In qualità di membro dell'NSA, ha collaborato con Carter alla gestione diplomatica degli affari internazionali, tra cui gli Accordi di Camp David del 1978, la normalizzazione dei rapporti tra Cina e Stati Uniti alla fine degli anni '70, la rivoluzione iraniana (che ha portato alla crisi degli ostaggi in Iran nel 1979) e l'invasione sovietica dell'Afghanistan nel 1979.
mt: In the 1960s, Brzezinski was a foreign policy adviser to John F. Kennedy and later to the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. In the 1976 presidential election, he advised Carter on foreign policy and later served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As a member of the NSA, he worked with Carter on the diplomatic management of international affairs, including the 1978 Camp David Accords, the normalization of relations between China and the United States in the late 1970s, the Iranian Revolution (which led to the Iran hostage crisis in 1979), and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Nato nella capitale croata Zagabria, Bobek è diventato famoso giocando nel Partizan Belgrado. Si è unito a loro nel 1945 e vi è rimasto fino al 1958. src: "La specie Hesperonychus elizabethae appartiene alla famiglia dei dromeosauridi (Dromaeosauridae) ed è considerata un cugino del Velociraptor. Si pensava che questo uccello rapace a sangue caldo e coperto interamente da piume camminasse eretto su due zampe e avesse artigli come il Velociraptor. Il nome Hesperonychus, che significa ""artiglio occidentale"", deriva dal suo secondo artiglio che era più grande."
mt: "The species Hesperonychus elizabethae belongs to the family of dromeosaurs (Dromaeosauridae) and is considered a cousin of the Velociraptor. It was thought that this warm-blooded feathered raptor walked upright on two legs and had claws like the Velociraptor. The name Hesperonychus, which means "western claw," comes from its second claw, which was larger."
ref: "Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor . This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means ""western claw."""

src: Alla festa, organizzata per celebrare il primo anniversario di una coppia convolata a nozze l'anno prima, hanno partecipato almeno 100 persone. I funzionari hanno dichiarato che un evento di celebrazione formale dell'anniversario è stato programmato per un'altra data. La coppia si era unita in matrimonio l'anno prima in Texas, poi aveva raggiunto Buffalo per festeggiare con amici e parenti. Il marito di 30 anni, nato a Buffalo, è stato una delle quattro vittime della sparatoria, ma la moglie è rimasta illesa.
mt: 100 people attended the party, which was held to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple who had married the year before. Officials said a formal anniversary celebration was planned for another date. The couple had married the year before in Texas, then traveled to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and family. The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of four victims of the shooting, but his wife was unharmed.
ref: At least 100 people had attended the party, in order to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was held last year. A formal anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, officials said. The couple had married in Texas one year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives. The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four killed in the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.

src: Il Luno trasportava a bordo circa 120-160 metri cubi di carburante quando si è spezzato, spinto sul frangiflutti da forti venti e mareggiate. Gli elicotteri hanno tratto in salvo i dodici membri dell'equipaggio; l'unica persona ferita ha riportato una frattura al naso. La nave, lunga 100 metri, si stava dirigendo verso un porto per effettuare il solito carico di fertilizzanti. All'inizio, il timore dei funzionari era che potesse verificarsi una fuoriuscita del carico dall'imbarcazione.
mt: 120-160 cubic meters of fuel were on board when the ship broke up, pushed against the breakwater by strong winds and waves. Helicopters rescued the twelve crew members; the only person injured suffered a broken nose. The ship, 100 meters long, was heading to a port to load its usual cargo of fertilizers. At first, officials were concerned that a spill could occur from the ship.
ref: The Luno had 120–160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it broke down and high winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater. Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose. The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.

src: Oltre alla regia, la carriera di Vautier include uno sciopero della fame nel 1973, che egli fece per combattere contro quella che considerava una censura politica. La legge francese venne modificata. Il suo attivismo risale alla seconda guerra mondiale, quando, all'età di 15 anni, entrò a far parte della Resistenza francese. Si è raccontato in un libro del 1998. Negli anni '60 è tornato in Algeria, che aveva appena ottenuto l'indipendenza, per insegnare regia cinematografica.
mt: Vautier's career includes a hunger strike in 1973, which he did to fight against what he considered political censorship. The French law was changed. His activism dates back to World War II, when, at the age of 15, he joined the French Resistance. He was the subject of a 1998 book. In the 1960s he returned to Algeria, which had just gained independence, to teach film directing.
ref: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship. French law was changed. His activism went back to age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He documented himself in a 1998 book. In the 1960s he headed back to newly-independent Algeria to teach film directing.

src: Oltre quattro milioni di persone si sono recate a Roma per prendere parte ai funerali. Le persone presenti erano talmente numerose che non è stato possibile per tutti avere accesso al funerale in piazza San Pietro. In vari punti di Roma sono stati installati grandi schermi televisivi per permettere alla gente di assistere alla cerimonia. Allestimenti simili sono stati realizzati in molte altre città italiane e nel resto del mondo, specialmente in Polonia, e un gran numero di persone ha guardato l'evento attraverso di essi.
mt: 4 million people attended the funeral in Rome. The people present were so numerous that not all of them could have access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square. In various points of Rome were installed large television screens to allow people to attend the ceremony. Similar arrangements were made in many other Italian cities and around the world, especially in Poland, and a large number of people watched the event through them.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral. The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square. Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony. In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Secondo i resoconti, un appartamento è esploso in Macbeth Street a causa di una perdita di gas. Un funzionario della compagnia del gas si era recato sul posto a seguito di una chiamata da parte di un vicino per una fuga di gas. Quando è arrivato l’ufficiale, l’appartamento è esploso. Non sono stati segnalati feriti gravi, tuttavia almeno cinque persone che erano sul posto al momento dell’esplosione sono state curate per sintomi da shock. L'appartamento era vuoto. In quel momento, furono evacuati dalla zona quasi 100 residenti.
mt: According to reports, an apartment exploded in Macbeth Street due to a gas leak. A gas company official had gone to the scene after a call from a neighbor about a gas leak. When the official arrived, the apartment exploded. No serious injuries were reported, however at least five people who were on the scene at the time of the explosion were treated for shock symptoms. The apartment was empty. At that time, almost 100 residents were evacuated from the area.
ref: According to reports, an apartment on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak. An official with the gas company was reporting to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak. When the official arrived, the apartment exploded. No major injuries were reported, but at least five people on scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock.
