src: I Giochi Olimpici vedranno il ritorno del golf e del rugby. Il Comitato Olimpico Internazionale ha votato a favore dell'inclusione degli sport durante la riunione del consiglio esecutivo tenutasi oggi a Berlino. Il rugby, nello specifico il rugby a 15, e il golf erano stati selezionati tra altri cinque sport come candidati a partecipare alle Olimpiadi. Gli sport di squash, karate e pattinaggio a rotelle provarono ad essere inseriti nel programma olimpico, così come il baseball e il softball, esclusi dai Giochi Olimpici nel 2005. Il voto dovrà essere ulteriormente ratificato dal CIO nella sessione plenaria di ottobre a Copenaghen.
mt: The Olympic Games will see the return of golf and rugby. The International Olympic Committee voted in favor of the inclusion of the sports during the executive council meeting held today in Berlin. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected from among five other sports as candidates to participate in the Olympics. The sports of squash, karate and roller skating tried to be included in the Olympic program, as well as baseball and softball, excluded from the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote must be further ratified by the IOC in the plenary session in October in Copenhagen.
ref: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics. Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.

mt: 250 years ago, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000-year lease on the St. James's Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland. Today, Guinness is a global company with an annual revenue of over $14.7 billion.
ref: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland. 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.

src: È stato confermato che il ceppo di influenza aviaria H5N1, letale per l'uomo, ha contagiato un'anatra selvatica, rinvenuta lunedì, morta, nella parte orientale della Francia, in una palude nei pressi di Lione. La Francia è il settimo Paese dell'Unione europea, dopo Austria, Germania, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Grecia e Italia, a essere colpito dal virus. I casi sospetti di H5N1 in Croazia e Danimarca non sono ancora confermati.
mt: It has been confirmed that the lethal H5N1 avian influenza virus has infected a wild duck, found dead on Monday, in the eastern part of France, in a marsh near Lyon. France is the seventh European Union country, after Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy, to be hit by the virus. Suspected H5N1 cases in Croatia and Denmark are not yet confirmed.
ref: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France. France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.

src: Le forze di pace dell'ONU giunte ad Haiti dopo il terremoto del 2010 sono ritenute responsabili della diffusione della malattia, iniziata nei pressi dell'accampamento dei soldati. Secondo la causa, l'inadeguata sanificazione dei rifiuti del campo delle Nazioni Unite ha provocato la contaminazione batterica dell'affluente del fiume Artibonite, uno dei principali di Haiti. Prima dell'arrivo delle truppe, i problemi di Haiti legati alla malattia risalivano al 1800. L'Istituto haitiano per la Giustizia e la Democrazia ha citato studi indipendenti secondo i quali la malattia è stata inconsapevolmente introdotta ad Haiti dalle forse internazionali nepalesi di peacekeeping delle Nazioni Unite. Danielle Lantagne, un'esperta delle Nazioni Unite sulla malattia, ha dichiarato che il focolaio potrebbe essere stato causato dalle forze di pace.
mt: 2010 Haiti earthquake peacekeepers are blamed for the spread of the disease, which began near the camp of the soldiers. According to the cause, the inadequate sanitation of the United Nations camp waste has caused the bacterial contamination of the Artibonite River, one of the main rivers of Haiti. Before the arrival of the troops, Haiti's problems related to the disease date back to 1800. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy cited independent studies that the disease was unwittingly introduced to Haiti by the Nepalese peacekeeping forces of the United Nations. Danielle Lantagne, an expert of the United Nations on the disease, said the outbreak could have been caused by the peacekeepers.
ref: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment. According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest. Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.

src: "Il governo irlandese insiste sull'urgenza di una normativa parlamentare per correggere la situazione. Un portavoce del governo ha dichiarato ""che adesso è importante sia dal punto di vista della salute pubblica sia da quello della giustizia penale adottare le leggi il prima possibile"". Il Ministro della Salute ha manifestato preoccupazione per due aspetti: da un lato, per il benessere delle persone che approfittano della provvisoria legalità delle sostanze coinvolte, dall'altro per le condanne associate, emesse a partire dall'entrata in vigore delle modifiche ora incostituzionali."
mt: "The Irish government insists on the urgency of a parliamentary regulation to correct the situation. A government spokesman said ""it is now important both from a public health and criminal justice point of view to adopt the laws as soon as possible"". The Minister of Health expressed concern about two aspects: on the one hand, for the well-being of people who take advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, on the other hand, for the sentences associated with it, issued since the entry into force of the amendments now unconstitutional."
ref: "The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation. ""It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible"", said a government spokesperson. The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect."

src: Karno è un tutor di inglese molto celebre ma controverso, che ha insegnato presso gli istituti Modern Education e King's Glory, e ha affermato di aver avuto 9.000 studenti all'apice della sua carriera. Nei suoi appunti usava parole ritenute volgari da alcuni genitori e, a quanto si dice, pronunciava oscenità in classe. È stato accusato da Modern Education di aver stampato grandi annunci pubblicitari sugli autobus senza autorizzazione e di aver mentito dicendo di essere il principale tutor di inglese. In precedenza è stato anche incolpato di violazione del copyright, ma senza essere accusato. Un ex-studente ha dichiarato che 'si comportava come un amico, parlando con lo slang in classe e dando consigli per gli appuntamenti'.
mt: Karno is a very famous but controversial English tutor who taught at Modern Education and King's Glory, and claimed to have had 9,000 students at the height of his career. In his notes he used words considered vulgar by some parents and, it is said, he swore in class. He was accused by Modern Education of having printed large advertising posters on buses without permission and of having lied saying he was the main English tutor. He was previously also accused of copyright infringement, but not charged. A former student said that 'he behaved like a friend, speaking slang in class and giving advice on dates'.
ref: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career. In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class. Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor. He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged. A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'

src: A Manila, capitale delle Filippine, un ex poliziotto filippino ha preso in ostaggio dei turisti di Hong Kong dopo aver dirottato il loro autobus. Con il suo fucile M16 Rolando Mendoza ha fatto fuoco sui turisti. Molti degli ostaggi sono stati salvati, almeno sei sono deceduti. Sei ostaggi, tra cui bambini e anziani, sono stati liberati subito insieme ai fotografi filippini. I fotografi si sono poi sostituiti a un'anziana signora che aveva bisogno di usare il bagno. Mendoza è stato colpito a morte.
mt: In Manila, capital of the Philippines, a former Philippine policeman has taken Hong Kong tourists hostage after hijacking their bus. With his M16 rifle Rolando Mendoza has fired on the tourists. Many of the hostages have been rescued, at least six have died. Six hostages, including children and elderly, have been released immediately along with Filipino photographers. The photographers then substituted for an elderly woman who needed to use the bathroom. Mendoza was shot dead.
ref: A former Filipino policeman has kept Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far. Six hostages, including the children and elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers. The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.

src: Il Brasile è il più grande Paese cattolico della Terra, e da sempre la Chiesa cattolica si è opposta alla legalizzazione dei matrimoni tra persone dello stesso sesso nel Paese. Il Congresso nazionale del Brasile ha dibattuto della legalizzazione per 10 anni e questo tipo di matrimoni civili sono al momento legali solo nel Rio Grande do Sul. La prima bozza del progetto di legge originale è stata scritta dall'ex sindaco di San Paolo, Marta Suplicy. La proposta di legge, dopo alcune correzioni, è passata nelle mani di Roberto Jefferson. I manifestanti sperano di raccogliere un milione e duecentomila firme con una petizione da presentare al congresso nazionale a novembre.
mt: Brazil is the largest Catholic country in the world, and the Catholic Church has always opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The Brazilian National Congress has debated the legalization for 10 years and this type of civil marriage is currently legal only in Rio Grande do Sul. The original draft of the bill was written by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The bill, after some corrections, was passed to Roberto Jefferson. The protesters hope to collect one million and two hundred thousand signatures with a petition to be presented to the national congress in November.
ref: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.

src: "Cinque minuti dopo l'inizio dello spettacolo, inizia il vento, circa un minuto dopo, il vento sta raggiungendo i 70 km/h... poi arriva la pioggia, così violenta e torrenziale da pungerti la pelle come un ago, poi inizia a cadere la grandine, persone in preda al panico, che urlano e scappano, travolgendosi. ""Ho perso mia sorella e la sua amica, mentre mi spostavo avevo davanti a me due disabili in sedia a rotelle e le persone che gli saltavano addosso e le spingevano"", ha detto Armand Versace."
mt: "Five minutes after the show started, the wind begins, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70 km/h... then comes the rain, so violent and torrential to prick the skin like a needle, then hail begins to fall, people in a panic, screaming and running, trampling each other. src: Secondo i meteorologi, la tempesta, che si trova a circa 645 miglia (1.040 km) a ovest delle isole di Capo Verde, potrebbe indebolirsi prima di minacciare zone terrestri. Fred si muove attualmente con venti di 105 miglia all’ora (165 km/h) in direzione nord-ovest. Fred rappresenta il ciclone tropicale più violento mai registrato fino ad oggi a sud e a est dell'Atlantico da quando sono state introdotte le immagini satellitari, e soltanto il terzo uragano più grande mai registrato a est del 35°W.

src: Lo standard 802.11n può operare sia nella banda dei 2.4Ghz che in quella dei 5.0Ghz. Posto che la stazione base abbia doppie radio, questo gli consentirà di essere retrocompatibile con 802.11a, 802.11b e 802.11g. Le velocità 802.11n sono considerevolmente più elevate rispetto a quelle delle versioni precedenti, con un throughput massimo teorico di 600 Mbps.
mt: 802.11n can operate in both the 2.4GHz and 5.0GHz bands. If the base station has dual radios, this will allow it to be backward compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g. 802.11n speeds are significantly higher than previous versions, with a theoretical maximum throughput of 600 Mbps.

ref: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt. He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.

src: La mappa internazionale dei terremoti dello United States Geological Survey la settimana precedente non riportava terremoti in Islanda. Non è stata segnalata alcuna attività sismica nella zona di Hekla nelle ultime 48 ore da parte dell’Ufficio meteorologico islandese. La notevole attività sismica all'origine del cambiamento di fase si era verificata il 10 marzo presso la caldera sommitale del vulcano, sul versante di nord-est. È stata segnalata la presenza di nubi scure ai piedi della montagna, non correlate ad attività vulcanica. Le nuvole creavano confusione sulla possibilità che si fosse realmente verificata un'eruzione.
mt: The USGS international earthquake map for the previous week did not report earthquakes in Iceland.  No seismic activity was reported in the Hekla area in the last 48 hours by the Icelandic Meteorological Office.  Notable seismic activity that led to the change in phase occurred on March 10 at the summit caldera of the volcano, on the northeast flank.  Dark clouds were reported at the base of the mountain, not related to volcanic activity.  The clouds created confusion about whether an eruption had actually occurred.
ref: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera. Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.

src: L'orbiter lunare della missione senza equipaggio Chandrayaan-1 ha sganciato la sonda Moon Impact Probe (MIP), che ha sfrecciato sulla superficie lunare ad una velocità di 1,5 km/s (3000 miglia/h), per poi impattare sulla Luna vicino al suo polo sud. La sonda lunare ha portato con sé, oltre a tre importanti strumenti scientifici, anche l'effigie della bandiera nazionale indiana dipinta su tutti i lati.
mt: The lunar orbiter of the Chandrayaan-1 unmanned mission released the Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which streaked toward the lunar surface at 1.5 km/s (3,000 mph), then impacted the Moon near its south pole. The lunar probe carried three important scientific instruments, as well as the image of the Indian national flag painted on all sides.
ref: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole. Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.

src: I primi casi di malattia della stagione si sono verificati a fine luglio. I maiali sono portatori della malattia, che successivamente viene trasmessa all'uomo tramite le punture di zanzare. Il governo indiano, spinto dall'epidemia, ha adottato alcune misure come il dispiegamento di persone per la cattura dei maiali nelle zone più colpite, la distribuzione di migliaia di zanzariere e l'irrorazione con pesticidi. Il governo ha anche promesso diversi milioni di fiale di vaccino contro l'encefalite, per fare in modo che il prossimo anno le strutture sanitarie non si trovino impreparate. I piani di consegna dei vaccini nelle zone storicamente più colpite quest'anno sono stati ritardati per la mancanza di fondi e perché è stato assegnato loro un basso livello di priorità rispetto ad altre malattie.
mt: The first cases of the season were reported in late July. Pigs are carriers of the disease, which is then transmitted to humans through mosquito bites. The Indian government, spurred by the epidemic, has taken some measures such as deploying people to capture pigs in the most affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito nets and spraying pesticides. The government has also promised several million doses of vaccine against encephalitis, to ensure that next year's health facilities are not caught unprepared. The plans to deliver the vaccines to historically affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and because they were given a low priority level compared to other diseases.
ref: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July. The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos. The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides. Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year. Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.

src: La proposta di emendamento è già stata approvata dalle Camere nel 2011. In questa sessione legislativa è stata apportata una modifica che consiste nella cancellazione della seconda frase attuata prima dalla Camera dei Rappresentanti e poi approvata dal Senato lunedì. L'insuccesso della seconda frase che propone di proibire le unioni civili omosessuali potrebbe, forse, in futuro, aprire per loro uno spiraglio. Al termine della procedura, la HJR 3 verrà riesaminata dalla prossima legislatura eletta, nel 2015 o nel 2016, così da rimanere in esame.
mt: The amendment was already approved by both chambers in 2011.  In this legislative session, a change was made by removing the second sentence that was first approved by the House of Representatives and then by the Senate on Monday. The failure of the second sentence that proposes to ban same-sex civil unions may, in the future, open a loophole for them. At the end of the procedure, the HJR 3 will be reexamined by the next legislature elected in 2015 or 2016, so that it remains under consideration.
ref: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011. A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday. The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future. Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.

src: "Il termine generico ""Panama Papers"" si riferisce a circa dieci milioni di documenti trapelati alla stampa nella primavera del 2016 appartenenti allo studio legale di Panama Mossack Fonseca. I documenti hanno dimostrato che quattordici banche hanno aiutato clienti danarosi a nascondere miliardi di dollari statunitensi di patrimonio per eludere tasse e altre normative. Secondo il quotidiano britannico The Guardian, la Deutsche Bank controllava circa un terzo delle 1.200 società fittizie usate per raggiungere questo scopo. Si sono verificate proteste in tutto il mondo, come pure varie azioni penali e si sono dimessi i capi di governo di Islanda e Pakistan."
mt: "The generic term ""Panama Papers"" refers to about ten million documents leaked to the press in the spring of 2016 belonging to the law firm of Panama Mossack Fonseca. The documents have shown that fourteen banks have helped wealthy clients to hide billions of U.S. dollars of wealth to evade taxes and other regulations. According to the British newspaper The Guardian, the Deutsche Bank controlled about a third of the 1,200 fictitious companies used to achieve this goal. Protests have occurred worldwide, as well as various legal actions and the prime ministers of Iceland and Pakistan have resigned."
ref: """Panama Papers"" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016. The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this. There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned."

src: Gli incidenti aerei sono comuni in Iran, la cui flotta è ormai obsoleta e mal mantenuta, sia dal punto di vista civile che da quello militare. Le sanzioni internazionali hanno significato non poter acquistare nuovi velivoli. All'inizio di questa settimana, tre persone sono rimaste uccise e altre tre ferite in seguito ad un incidente di un elicottero della polizia. Il mese scorso l'Iran ha vissuto il peggior disastro aereo degli ultimi anni: un aereo di linea diretto in Armenia è precipitato, causando la morte dei 168 passeggeri a bordo. Lo stesso mese ha visto un altro aereo di linea finire fuori pista a Mashad e schiantarsi contro un muro, uccidendo diciassette persone.
mt: Aerial incidents are common in Iran, whose fleet is now obsolete and poorly maintained, both civil and military. International sanctions have meant not being able to buy new aircraft. Earlier this week, three people were killed and three others injured in a police helicopter crash. Last month Iran experienced the worst air disaster in years: a flight to Armenia crashed, killing all 168 passengers on board. The same month saw another airliner overshoot the runway in Mashad and crash into a wall, killing seventeen people.
ref: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.

src: "Il gruppo di studio sull’Iraq ha presentato oggi alle 12.00 GMT la sua relazione. Ammonisce: ""Nessuno può garantire che qualsiasi azione in Iraq in questo momento fermerà le guerre settarie, la crescente violenza o una deriva verso il caos"". Il rapporto inizia con un appello a un dibattito aperto e alla creazione di un consenso negli Stati Uniti circa la politica nei confronti del Medio Oriente. Il rapporto è fortemente critico in merito a quasi tutti gli aspetti dell'attuale politica dell'Esecutivo nei confronti dell'Iraq ed esorta a un cambiamento immediato di direzione. La prima delle sue 78 raccomandazioni riguarda l'avvio di una nuova iniziativa diplomatica da intraprendere entro la fine di quest'anno con lo scopo di proteggere i confini dell'Iraq da azioni ostili e di riprendere i rapporti diplomatici con i suoi vicini."
mt: "The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12:00 GMT today. It warns: ""No one can guarantee that any action in Iraq at this time will stop sectarian war, rising violence, or a slide toward chaos."" The report begins with an appeal for an open debate and the creation of a consensus in the United States about policy in the Middle East. The report is strongly critical of almost all aspects of the current Executive policy towards Iraq and urges an immediate change of direction. The first of its 78 recommendations concerns the initiation of a new diplomatic initiative to be undertaken by the end of this year to protect Iraq's borders from hostile actions and to resume diplomatic relations with its neighbors."
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: "Secondo l'Ansa, ""la polizia nutriva preoccupazioni per un paio di arresti di primo livello che temevano potessero innescare una vera e propria guerra di successione. La polizia afferma che fu Lo Piccolo ad avere la meglio poiché era stato il braccio destro di Provenzano a Palermo e, grazie alla sua grande esperienza, guadagnò il rispetto della vecchia generazione di boss impegnati a proseguire la politica di Provenzano volta a mantenere un basso profilo e a rafforzare la rete di potere. Il potere di questi boss finì nel momento in cui Provenzano pose fine alla guerra guidata dei Riina contro lo Stato, guerra che nel 1992 causò la morte degli attivisti antimafia Giovanni Falcone e Paolo Borsellino""."
mt: "According to Ansa, ""the police were concerned about a couple of first-level arrests that they feared could trigger a real succession war. The police say it was Lo Piccolo who had the upper hand because he was Riina's right-hand man in Palermo and, thanks to his great experience, gained the respect of the old generation of bosses engaged in continuing Provenzano's policy of maintaining a low profile and strengthening the power network. The power of these bosses ended when Provenzano ended the war led by Riina against the state, a war that in 1992 caused the death of anti-mafia activists Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino.""
ref: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: È scomparso all'età di 54 anni il judoista giapponese, Hitoshi Saito; vinse due medaglie d'oro olimpiche. La morte è sopravvenuta a causa di un cancro del dotto biliare intraepatico. È deceduto a Osaka martedì. Ex campione olimpico e ex campione del mondo, al momento della sua morte Saito era anche presidente del comitato di formazione della Federazione All Japan Judo.
mt: 54-year-old Japanese judoist Hitoshi Saito died of bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. Former Olympic and world champion, at the time of his death Saito was also president of the All Japan Judo Federation training committee.
ref: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54. The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.

src: Poco dopo la partenza, Giancarlo Fisichella ha perso il controllo della sua auto e ha terminato la sua gara. Fernando Alonso, suo compagno di squadra, è stato in testa per gran parte della gara, ma la sua gara si è conclusa subito dopo il suo pit-stop, probabilmente per il montaggio non corretto della ruota anteriore destra. Michael Schumacher ha raggiunto il traguardo alle spalle di Alonso, a causa di un danno alle sospensioni verificatosi in uno dei duelli di cui è stato protagonista nel corso della gara.
mt: Shortly after the start, Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended his race. Fernando Alonso, his teammate, was in the lead for most of the race, but his race ended shortly after his pit stop, probably due to the incorrect mounting of the right front wheel. Michael Schumacher reached the finish line behind Alonso, due to a suspension damage that occurred during one of the duels in which he was involved during the race.
ref: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel. Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.

src: Negli ultimi 3 mesi, oltre 80 detenuti sono stati rilasciati dal Centro di detenzione senza una formale accusa. Ad aprile di quest'anno, il giudice Glynn ha emesso un'ordinanza restrittiva nei confronti della struttura, imponendo il rilascio di qualunque detenuto a cui non sia concessa un'udienza presso un funzionario del tribunale entro 24 ore dall'arresto. Il Commissario stabilisce la cauzione, nel caso sia stata concessa, e formalizza l'accusa presentata dall'ufficiale che ha eseguito l'arresto. L'accusa viene poi registrata nel sistema informatico di Stato, all'interno del quale verrà tenuta traccia del caso. Tale udienza inoltre stabilisce la data del rapido processo a cui ha diritto il sospettato.
mt: 80 detainees have been released from the detention center in the last 3 months without formal charges. In April of this year, Judge Glynn issued an injunction against the facility, requiring the release of any detainee who is not granted a hearing before a court official within 24 hours of arrest. The Commissioner sets the bail, if granted, and formalizes the charge presented by the arresting officer. The charge is then registered in the state's computer system, where it will be tracked. This hearing also sets the date of the speedy trial to which the suspect is entitled.
ref: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged. In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.

src: Lodin ha inoltre dichiarato che i funzionari hanno deciso di cancellare il ballottaggio, per consentire al governo afgano di risparmiare le spese e di ridurre i rischi per la sicurezza che un'altra elezione avrebbe comportato. Secondo i diplomatici l'ambiguità riscontrata nella costituzione afghana è sufficiente per ritenere il ballottaggio non necessario. Questo è in contraddizione con i report precedenti, secondo cui l'annullamento del ballottaggio sarebbe stato contrario alla Costituzione.
mt: Lodin also stated that officials decided to cancel the runoff, to allow the Afghan government to save money and reduce the security risks that another election would have brought. According to diplomats, the ambiguity found in the Afghan constitution is sufficient to consider the runoff unnecessary. This is in contradiction with previous reports, which stated that the cancellation of the runoff would be contrary to the Constitution.
ref: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election. Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.

src: "Dall'indipendenza del Pakistan dal dominio britannico del 1947, il presidente pachistano ha incaricato ""agenti politici"" a capo delle FATA, i quali esercitano un controllo autonomo quasi totale su quelle aree. Questi agenti hanno la responsabilità di prestare servizi governativi e giudiziari in conformità con l'articolo 247 della Costituzione del Pakistan."

src: NHK ha inoltre riferito che la centrale nucleare di Kashiwazaki Kariwa, che si trova nella provincia di Niigata, era regolarmente operativa. La Hokuriku Electric Power Co. non ha riportato nessun danno dovuto al terremoto; ha inoltre riferito che i reattori n. 1 e 2 della centrale nucleare di Shika sono stati chiusi. Secondo quanto riportato, circa 9400 case della zona sono senza acqua e circa 100 senza corrente elettrica. src: Secondo quanto trapelato, oggetto del documento sarà la disputa sui confini, che la Palestina vuole siano basati sui confini esistenti prima della Guerra del Medio Oriente del 1967. Stando a quel che si dice, gli altri temi affrontati includono lo status futuro di Gerusalemme, che è sacra per entrambe le nazioni, e la questione della Valle del Giordano. Una volta firmato l'accordo, Israele esige una presenza militare costante nella valle, mentre l'Autorità palestinese accetta di abbandonare tale presenza solo per cinque anni.
mt: According to leaks, the document will address the dispute over borders, which the Palestinians want to be based on the borders existing before the 1967 Six-Day War.  According to what is said, other issues to be addressed include the future status of Jerusalem, which is sacred to both nations, and the issue of the Jordan Valley.  Once the agreement is signed, Israel demands a constant military presence in the valley, while the Palestinian Authority accepts abandoning such presence only for five years.
ref: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.

src: Una volta emerso chiaramente che molte famiglie erano in cerca di un supporto legale per contrastare gli sfratti, il 20 marzo presso il centro East Bay Community Law Center si è tenuto un incontro per le vittime delle truffe delle abitazioni. Quando gli inquilini iniziarono a raccontare quanto gli era accaduto, gran parte delle famiglie coinvolte d'un tratto capì che Carolyn Wilson dell'OHA aveva sottratto i suoi depositi cauzionali e se l'era svignata dalla città. Gli inquilini di Lockwood Gardens ritengono che altre 40 o più famiglie potrebbero rischiare lo sfratto, avendo appreso che la polizia dell'OHA sta indagando anche su altri immobili di edilizia pubblica a Oakland che potrebbero essere rimasti coinvolti nella truffa abitativa.
mt: 20 March, a meeting was held at the East Bay Community Law Center for victims of housing fraud. When tenants began to tell their stories, many of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of OHA had absconded with their security deposits and had fled the city. Tenants of Lockwood Gardens believe that another 40 or more families may be at risk of eviction, having learned that the OHA police are investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may have been involved in the housing fraud.

Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.

src: Questa è considerata la quinta volta nella storia in cui si osserva qualcosa che poi si è rivelato essere materiale marziano chimicamente confermato e precipitato sulla Terra. Tra i circa 24.000 meteoriti noti caduti sulla Terra, solo 34 all'incirca sono risultati di origine marziana. Quindici di queste rocce sono il prodotto della pioggia di meteoriti avvenuta lo scorso luglio. Alcune rocce estremamente rare sulla Terra sono vendute a prezzi che vanno da 11.000 dollari a 22.500 dollari all'oncia, che è circa dieci volte il prezzo dell'oro.
mt: This is the fifth time in history that something has been observed that later turned out to be Martian material confirmed chemically and fallen to Earth. Of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites that have fallen to Earth, only about 34 are of Martian origin. Fifteen of these rocks are the result of the meteorite shower that occurred last July. Some extremely rare rocks on Earth are sold at prices ranging from $11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times the price of gold.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

src: Fino ad oggi, AOL ha avuto la capacità di imporre il proprio passo al progresso e allo sviluppo del mercato della messaggistica istantanea, grazie alla sua vasta diffusione negli Stati Uniti. A seguito di questo accordo, la libertà potrebbe finire. Il numero degli utenti di Yahoo! Insieme a quello degli utenti dei servizi Microsoft potrà competere con il numero di clienti di AOL.
mt: Until now, AOL has had the ability to set the pace of progress and development of the instant messaging market, thanks to its wide distribution in the United States. Following this agreement, freedom may end. The number of Yahoo! Users together with the number of Microsoft users can compete with the number of AOL customers.
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: Un'autobomba è esplosa ieri mattina nella sede della polizia di Gaziantep, in Turchia, uccidendo due agenti e ferendo oltre venti persone. L'ufficio del governatore ha riferito che tra i feriti, diciannove erano agenti di polizia. La polizia ha riferito che il sospettato responsabile dell'attacco è un presunto militante di Daesh (ISIL).
mt: A car bomb exploded this morning in the police headquarters of Gaziantep, Turkey, killing two officers and injuring over twenty people. The governor's office reported that nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police reported that the suspected perpetrator of the attack is a suspected ISIL militant.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: "Martedì l'ex governatore del Massachusetts, Mitt Romney, con più del 46% dei voti si è aggiudicato la vittoria alle elezioni primarie presidenziali del Partito Repubblicano della Florida. Newt Gingrinch, ex presidente della Camera degli Stati Uniti, si è classificato secondo ottenendo il 32%. Essendo uno Stato dove vige la regola del ""winner takes all"" (""chi vince prende tutto""), la Florida ha assegnato tutti e cinquanta i suoi delegati a Romney, portandolo avanti come candidato per il Partito Repubblicano."
mt: "On Tuesday, former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican presidential primary with more than 46 percent of the vote. Newt Gingrich, former Speaker of the House, came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-take-all state, Florida awarded all 50 of its delegates to Romney, putting him ahead as the Republican Party's candidate."
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

src: "Ottengono, rispettivamente, il quarto, il quinto e il sesto posto Newt Gingrich, ex presidente della Camera, Rick Perry, governatore del Texas e la deputata Michele Bachmann. Dopo l'arrivo dei risultati, Gingrich ha lodato Santorum ma ha dispensato parole dure per Romney, per conto del quale sono stati trasmessi in Iowa annunci elettorali negativi contro Gingrich. Perry ha dichiarato: ""Tornerò in Texas per verificare i risultati della consultazione di stasera e vedere se per me c'è la possibilità di proseguire in questa competizione""; tuttavia in seguito ha affermato che rimarrà in corsa e il 21 gennaio parteciperà alle primarie nel South Carolina. Bachmann, che ad agosto ha vinto lo straw poll in Iowa, ha deciso di terminare la sua campagna."
mt: "Newt Gingrich, former Speaker of the House, Rick Perry, governor of Texas and Rep. Michele Bachmann finish fourth, fifth and sixth, respectively. After the results were announced, Gingrich praised Santorum but had harsh words for Romney, who had been airing negative ads against Gingrich. Perry said, ""I'll go back to Texas to check the results of tonight's vote and see if there's a possibility for me to continue in this competition""; however, he later said he would stay in the race and participate in the South Carolina primaries on January 21. Bachmann, who won the straw poll in Iowa in August, decided to end her campaign."
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

Inizialmente, lo show era andato in onda solo sullo storico sito radiofonico online TogiNet Radio, specializzato nei talk show radiofonici. TogiNet ha costituito AstroNet Radio come stazione consociata alla fine del 2015. Il programma utilizzava originariamente doppiatori non professionisti dell'est del Texas."
mt: "The website of the station defines the program as ""old-fashioned radio theater, with a new and sacrilegious geek slap!"". Initially, the show aired only on the historic online radio station TogiNet Radio, specializing in radio talk shows. TogiNet formed AstroNet Radio as a sister station at the end of 2015. The program originally used non-professional voice actors from East Texas."

src: Gli assalitori di Mumbai sono arrivati il 26 novembre 2008 su di una barca, equipaggiati di granate e armi automatiche; hanno attaccato in più punti, compresa l'affollata stazione ferroviaria Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus e il celebre Taj Mahal Hotel. Le indagini e le informazioni reperite da David Headley avevano contribuito a rendere possibile l'azione dei 10 tiratori del gruppo militante pakistano Lashkar-e-Taiba. Le relazioni tra l'India e il Pakistan sono state messe a dura prova dall'attacco.
mt: 26 November 2008 gunmen arrived by boat, armed with grenades and automatic weapons; they attacked in multiple locations, including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. Investigations and information gathered by David Headley had made possible the action of the 10 shooters of the Pakistani militant group Lashkar-e-Taiba. Relations between India and Pakistan were strained by the attack.
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

src: "In aggiunta all'evento di mercoledì, la Carpanedo ha partecipato a due gare singole dei Campionati. La prima nello slalom, dove alla prima discesa ha fatto registrare un DNT. Altri 36 concorrenti su 116 nella stessa gara non hanno concluso la prova. L'altra gara a cui ha partecipato, lo slalom gigante, l'ha vista classificarsi decima nel gruppo femminile della categoria ""seduti"", con un tempo di percorrenza combinato di 4:41.30, più lento di 2:11.60 minuti rispetto alla prima classificata, l'austriaca Claudia Loesch, e più lento di 1:09.02 minuti rispetto al nono posto dell'ungherese Gyöngyi Dani. Quattro sciatrici del gruppo femminile non sono riuscite a terminare le loro discese, e 45 delle 117 partecipanti allo Slalom Gigante non si sono classificate nella gara."
mt: "In addition to Wednesday's event, Carpanedo participated in two single races of the Championships. The first in slalom, where at the first descent recorded a DNT. Other 36 competitors out of 116 in the same race did not complete the test. The other race in which he participated, the giant slalom, saw him classified tenth in the female group of the category ""sitting"", with a combined time of descent of 4:41.30, slower than 2:11.60 minutes compared to the first placed, the Austrian Claudia Loesch, and slower than 1:09.02 minutes compared to the ninth place of the Hungarian Gyöngyi Dani. Four skiers of the female group did not finish their descents, and 45 of the 117 participants in the Giant Slalom did not classify in the race."
ref: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.

src: In seguito alla preoccupante situazione dovuta al COVID-19, la National Basketball Association (NBA) degli Stati Uniti mercoledì ha deciso di sospendere la stagione di basket professionistico. La decisione è stata presa dalla NBA dopo che un giocatore degli Utah Jazz è risultato positivo al virus COVID-19.
mt: In response to the concerning situation due to COVID-19, the National Basketball Association (NBA) of the United States on Wednesday decided to suspend the professional basketball season. The decision was made by the NBA after a player of the Utah Jazz tested positive for the COVID-19 virus.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: Il titolo di giocatore del giorno oggi va a Alex Ovechkin, dei Washington Capitals. Ha realizzato 2 gol e 2 assist nella partita vinta dai Washington per 5-3 contro gli Atlanta Thrashers. Il primo assist di Ovechkin della serata è stato quello che ha permesso all'esordiente Nicklas Backstrom di segnare il gol della vittoria; il secondo gol della serata è stato il suo 60° gol della stagione, e questo fa di lui il primo giocatore a realizzare 60 gol (o più) in una stagione dal 1995-96, stagione in cui Jaromir Jagr e Mario Lemieux raggiunsero entrambi questo traguardo.
mt: Today's player of the day goes to Alex Ovechkin, of the Washington Capitals. He scored 2 goals and 2 assists in the game won by the Capitals 5-3 against the Atlanta Thrashers. The first assist of Ovechkin of the evening was the one that allowed the rookie Nicklas Backstrom to score the winning goal; the second goal of the evening was his 60th goal of the season, and this makes him the first player to score 60 goals (or more) in a season since the 1995-96 season, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux both reached this milestone.
ref: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.

src: La banca Northern Rock era stata nazionalizzata nel 2008, dopo che era stato rivelato che l'azienda aveva ottenuto aiuti di emergenza dal governo inglese. La Northern Rock aveva richiesto sostegno in seguito alla sua esposizione nel corso della crisi dei mutui subprime del 2007. Il Virgin Group di Sir Richard Branson si è visto respingere un'offerta di acquisto della banca prima che questa venisse nazionalizzata. Nel 2010, è avvenuta la scissione dell'attuale banca principale Northern Rock plc, ancora nazionalizzata, dalla 'bad bank' (banca cattiva), la Northern Rock (Asset Management). La Virgin ha acquistato solamente la 'good bank' della Northern Rock, non l'impresa di gestione patrimoniale.
mt: Northern Rock was nationalised in 2008 after it was revealed that the bank had received emergency government support. Northern Rock had requested support after being exposed during the 2007 subprime mortgage crisis. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group was rejected in its bid to buy the bank before it was nationalised. In 2010, the current main bank Northern Rock plc, still nationalised, was split from the 'bad bank' (bad bank), Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin only bought the 'good bank' of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.
ref: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.

src: Con la decisione del signor Rudd di firmare l’accordo sul clima di Kyoto, gli Stati Uniti, che ora saranno l’unica nazione sviluppata a non averlo ratificato, rimangono isolati. Il precedente governo conservatore australiano aveva rifiutato di ratificare gli accordi di Kyoto asserendo che avrebbero danneggiato l'economia, data la pesante dipendenza dalle esportazioni di carbone, mentre gli obiettivi sulle emissioni non sarebbero stati vincolanti per Paesi come l'India e la Cina.
mt: With the decision of Mr Rudd to sign the Kyoto climate change agreement, the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to have ratified it, remains isolated. The previous conservative Australian government had refused to ratify the Kyoto agreements, claiming that they would damage the economy, given the heavy dependence on coal exports, while the emission targets would not be binding for countries like India and China.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: I tiratori all'interno del programma sperimentale per il controllo degli animali nocivi dovevano essere attentamente sorvegliati dai ranger, dal momento che l'esperimento era monitorato e la sua efficacia valutata. Nel quadro del programma di caccia dell'associazione Sporting Shooters Association, la NPWS in collaborazione con l'associazione Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc., ha reclutato volontari qualificati. Secondo Mick O'Flynn, direttore facente funzione del Park Conservation and Heritage del NPWS, i quattro tiratori scelti per la prima operazione di tiro hanno ricevuto formazione e istruzioni di sicurezza esaustive.
mt: The shooters in the experimental pest control program were to be closely monitored by rangers, as the experiment was being monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In the context of the hunting program of the Sporting Shooters Association, the NPWS in collaboration with the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc., recruited qualified volunteers. According to Mick O'Flynn, acting director of the Park Conservation and Heritage of the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation have received extensive training and safety instructions.
ref: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.

src: "Sulla base di questo fossile, la distinzione si colloca in un'epoca molto più remota rispetto a quanto era emerso dalle prove molecolari. ""In pratica vuol dire che dobbiamo retrodatare tutto"", ha affermato Berhane Asfaw, ricercatore presso il Rift Valley Research Service in Etiopia e co-autore dello studio."
mt: "Based on this fossil, the split is much older than what the molecular data had suggested. ""In effect, we have to push back the clock"", said Berhane Asfaw, a researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study."
ref: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."

src: Al discorso di presentazione del Tokyo Game Show di giovedì, Satoru Iwata, presidente di Nintendo, ha rivelato il design del controller della nuova console Nintendo Revolution. In modo analogo al telecomando della TV, attraverso due sensori situati accanto al televisore dell'utente il controller riesce a triangolare la sua posizione nello spazio tridimensionale. Questo consentirà ai giocatori di controllare le azioni e i movimenti all'interno del videogioco muovendo in aria il dispositivo.
mt: At the Thursday presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata revealed the design of the controller for the new Nintendo Revolution console.  In a similar way to a TV remote, through two sensors located next to the user's television, the controller is able to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space.  This will allow players to control actions and movements within the video game by moving the device in the air.
ref: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

src: In un primo momento l'agenzia di stampa cinese Xinhua aveva segnalato il dirottamento di un aereo. Secondo i rapporti ricevuti successivamente l'aereo avrebbe ricevuto una minaccia di bomba ed è stato dirottato facendolo tornare in Afghanistan, per poi atterrare a Kandahar. I primi rapporti affermano che il velivolo è stato deviato nuovamente verso l'Afghanistan dopo che è stato negato l'atterraggio di emergenza a Ürümqi.
mt: In an initial report, Xinhua news agency reported the plane was hijacked. Later reports said the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi. The plane was originally diverted to Kandahar after a bomb threat.
ref: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.

src: "La segretaria permanente del Comitato per il Nobel per la letteratura dell'Accademia svedese, Sara Danius, nel corso di un programma radiofonico andato in onda lunedì sulla radio svedese Sveriges Radio, ha annunciato pubblicamente che il Comitato ha rinunciato a contattare Bob Dylan, non riuscendo a raggiungerlo direttamente per comunicargli la vittoria del Nobel per la letteratura 2016. Danius ha dischiarato: ""Ora come ora non stiamo facendo niente. Ho telefonato e inviato e-mail al suo più stretto collaboratore, che mi ha risposto in modo molto gentile. Per il momento, basta e avanza""."
mt: "The secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature, Sara Danius, announced publicly on Monday during a radio program on the Swedish radio Sveriges Radio that the Committee has given up trying to contact Bob Dylan, unable to reach him directly to inform him of the Nobel Prize in Literature 2016. Danius said: ""We are not doing anything right now. I called and sent emails to his closest collaborator, who replied very politely. For now, that's enough."""
ref: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""

src: "Tre anni dopo il suo trasferimento in Svezia avvenuto nel 1956, Słania iniziò a lavorare per le Poste svedesi, diventandone l'incisore capo. Ha creato più di 1.000 francobolli, sia per la Svezia che per ulteriori 28 Paesi. La qualità e il dettaglio del suo lavoro sono talmente riconosciuti che è il suo è diventato uno dei pochissimi ""nomi familiari"" tra i filatelisti. Alcuni si sono specializzati addirittura nel collezionare unicamente il suo lavoro. Nel 2000 ha ottenuto il suo millesimo francobollo, il magnifico ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" (""Grandi gesta dei re svedesi"") di David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl, che è annoverato nel Guinness dei primati. Il suo lavoro consisteva anche nell'incidere le banconote di molti Paesi. Tra gli esempi recenti di questa attività ci sono i ritratti del Primo Ministro sul lato anteriore delle nuove banconote canadesi da 5 $ e 100 $."
mt: 3 years after his transfer to Sweden in 1956, Słania began working for the Swedish Post Office, becoming its chief engraver. He created more than 1,000 stamps, both for Sweden and for a further 28 countries. The quality and detail of his work are so recognized that it has become one of the very few ""familiar names"" among philatelists. Some have even specialized in collecting only his work. In 2000 he achieved his thousandth stamp, the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" (""Grandi gesta dei re svedesi"") by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. His work also included engraving the banknotes of many countries. Among recent examples of this activity are the portraits of the Prime Minister on the front of new Canadian $5 and $100 bills.
ref: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."

src: A seguito di una fuoriuscita di migliaia di barili di greggio avvenuta a sud di Fairbanks, in Alaska, 800 miglia dell'oleodotto Trans-Alaska Pipeline System sono state chiuse. A causa di un'interruzione di corrente verificatasi a seguito di un test di routine sul sistema di controllo antincendio, le valvole di sfogo si sono aperte facendo fuoriuscire il petrolio greggio nei pressi della stazione di pompaggio 9 di Fort Greely. L'apertura delle valvole ha consentito uno scarico di pressione dal sistema e la fuoriuscita di petrolio su una piattaforma, fino a raggiungere un serbatoio in grado di contenerne fino a 55.000 barili (2,3 milioni di galloni). Nel pomeriggio di mercoledì gli sfiati del serbatoio perdevano ancora, forse a causa di un'espansione termica all'interno dello stesso. Una seconda area di contenimento sotto le cisterne, in grado di contenere 104.500 barili, non è stata ancora riempita del tutto.
mt: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed after thousands of barrels of crude oil leaked near the Fort Greely pumping station. The spill occurred when a routine power outage caused the emergency shutoff valves to open, releasing pressure from the pipeline and spilling oil onto a platform, eventually reaching a containment pool capable of holding up to 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). The containment pool was still leaking in the afternoon of Wednesday, possibly due to thermal expansion within the pool. A second containment area under the tanks, capable of holding 104,500 barrels, was not yet full.
ref: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

src: Secondo una stima dell'USACE, 6 pollici di pioggia potrebbero rompere gli argini danneggiati in precedenza. Il Ninth Ward, dove l'uragano Katrina aveva provocato inondazioni alte fino a 20 piedi, in questo momento è quasi completamente sommerso poiché l'acqua ha superato l'argine vicino. L'acqua tracima da una sezione dell'argine larga 100 piedi.
mt: 6 inches of rain could break the damaged levees, according to USACE estimates. The Ninth Ward, where Hurricane Katrina had caused 20-foot high flooding, is almost completely submerged as water has topped a nearby levee. Water is spilling over a 100-foot section of the levee.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Le comete potrebbero essere state una delle fonti che hanno condotto sulla terra l'acqua e la materia organica, ossia la materia in grado di formare proteine e supportare la vita. Gli scienziati auspicano di comprendere in che modo si formano i pianeti e in particolare come si è formata la Terra, essendosi scontrata con delle comete molto tempo fa.
mt: Comets may have been one of the sources that brought water and organic matter, that is, matter capable of forming proteins and supporting life, to Earth. Scientists hope to understand how planets form and in particular how the Earth formed, having collided with comets a long time ago.
ref: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.

src: Nonostante le autorità dubitino della credibilità della minaccia, l'autorità dei trasporti del Maryland ha ordinato la chiusura su esortazione dell'FBI. mt: Despite doubts about the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportation Authority ordered the closure on the advice of the FBI. No traffic slowdown was reported on the beltway, which represents an alternative road of the city.

There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.

src: "Il fotografo è stato trasferito d'urgenza al Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, dove in seguito è deceduto. Stando a quanto riferito aveva circa 20 anni. Bieber ha dichiarato ""Anche se non ero presente né direttamente coinvolto in questo terribile incidente, i miei pensieri e le mie preghiere vanno ai familiari della vittima"". Da quanto appreso dal sito web di notizie di intrattenimento TMZ, il fotografo ha fermato il suo veicolo dalla parte opposta di Sepulveda Boulevard e ha cercato di fotografare l'ufficiale di polizia che dirigeva il traffico allo stop, poi ha attraversato la strada e ha proseguito, costringendo l'ufficiale di polizia della California Highway Patrol che stava effettuando il controllo del traffico allo stop a intimargli per due volte di tornare indietro. Secondo la polizia, è poco probabile che il conducente dell'auto che ha investito il fotografo subisca accuse penali."
mt: "The photographer was rushed to the Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he later died. He was reportedly about 20 years old. Bieber said, "Even though I was not present nor directly involved in this terrible accident, my prayers and thoughts go out to the family of the victim." According to the entertainment news website TMZ, the photographer stopped his vehicle on the opposite side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to photograph a police officer directing traffic at a stop sign, then crossed the street and continued, forcing the California Highway Patrol officer who was conducting the stop sign traffic control to order him twice to turn back. According to police, it is unlikely that the driver of the car that struck the photographer will face criminal charges."
ref: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."

src: "Arias è risultato positivo a una forma lieve del virus, ha affermato il ministro della presidenza Rodrigo Arias. Le condizioni del presidente sono stabili, ma dovrà rimanere in isolamento a casa sua per diversi giorni. Escludendo la febbre e il mal di gola, sto bene, sono in ottima forma e in grado di svolgere le mie funzioni in telelavoro. ""Prevedo di tornare alle mie mansioni lunedì"", ha dichiarato Arias in un comunicato."
mt: "Arias has tested positive for a mild form of the virus, said the Minister of the Presidency Rodrigo Arias. The president's condition is stable, but he will have to remain in isolation at his home for several days. Excluding fever and sore throat, I'm fine, I'm in great shape and able to perform my duties in telework. ""I expect to return to my duties on Monday"", said Arias in a statement."
ref: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."

src: Il ciclone tropicale Gonu, il cui nome nella lingua maldiviana fa riferimento a un cestino in foglie di palma, al suo apice ha raggiunto venti sostenuti di 240 chilometri orari (149 miglia orarie). Stamattina presto, i venti soffiavano a circa 83 km/h, e si prevedeva che continuassero a indebolirsi.
mt: The tropical cyclone Gonu, whose name in the Maldivian language refers to a basket made of palm leaves, reached its peak with sustained winds of 240 kilometers per hour (149 miles per hour). Early this morning, winds were blowing at about 83 km/h, and were expected to continue to weaken.
ref: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.

src: Il fenomeno della marea rossa si ha in seguito ad una concentrazione superiore al normale di Karenia brevis, un organismo marino unicellulare presente in natura. Intersecandosi, i fattori naturali possono produrre condizioni ideali che consentono a queste alghe di moltiplicarsi sensibilmente. L'alga produce una neurotossina in grado di paralizzare i nervi nell'uomo e nei pesci. Spesso i pesci muoiono a seguito delle elevate concentrazioni di tossine nell'acqua. L'uomo può venire contagiato dall'inalazione di acqua contaminata trasportata da vento e onde.
mt: Red tide is caused by a natural concentration of Karenia brevis, a single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to create ideal conditions for these algae to multiply significantly. The algae produce a neurotoxin that can paralyze nerves in humans and fish. Fish often die from high concentrations of toxins in the water. Humans can be infected by inhaling contaminated water carried by wind and waves.
ref: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

src: "L'uragano Felicia, una volta classificato come tempesta di categoria 4 sulla scala Saffir-Simpson, si è indebolito ed è stato declassato in una depressione tropicale, prima di dissiparsi nella giornata di martedì. I suoi strascichi hanno causato piogge nella maggior parte delle isole, anche se per il momento non si segnalano danni o allagamenti. La pioggia, che ha raggiunto i 6,34 pollici presso il pluviometro di Oahu, è stata descritta come ""benefica"". Alcune precipitazioni sono state accompagnate da frequenti fulmini e fenomeni temporaleschi."
mt: "Hurricane Felicia, once classified as a category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson scale, weakened and was downgraded to a tropical depression before dissipating on Tuesday. Its remnants caused rain on most of the islands, although no damage or flooding has been reported so far. The rain, which reached 6.34 inches at the pluviometer on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some precipitation was accompanied by frequent lightning and thunderstorms."
ref: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."

src: Piquet Jr. è andato a sbattere durante il Gran Premio di Singapore del 2008, subito dopo un pit-stop anticipato di Fernando Alonso, facendo uscire la safety car. Alonso si è staccato dal gruppo per conquistare la vittoria mentre le vetture davanti a lui si trovavano dietro la safety car per fare rifornimento. Al termine del Gran Premio d'Ungheria del 2009 Piquet Jr. è stato esonerato.
mt: 2008 Singapore Grand Prix: Piquet Jr. crashed after an early pit stop by Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. Alonso pulled away from the pack to win while the cars ahead of him were behind the safety car to refuel. At the end of the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix, Piquet Jr. was fired.
ref: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

src: Secondo uno studio pubblicato giovedì sulla rivista Science, sulle isole Galapagos in Ecuador sarebbe nata una nuova specie di uccelli. Secondo i ricercatori dell'Università di Princeton, Stati Uniti, e dell'Università di Uppsala, Svezia, la nuova specie si è evoluta in appena due generazioni, sebbene si ritenesse che il tempo necessario per questo processo fosse molto maggiore; questo per effetto dell'accoppiamento tra un fringuello endemico di Darwin, Geospiza fortes, e il fringuello dei cactus immigrato, Geospiza conirostris.
mt: A study published Thursday in the journal Science reports a new species of birds has evolved on the Galapagos Islands in Ecuador. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden say the new species evolved in just two generations, although it was thought the process would take much longer; this is due to crossbreeding between an endemic Darwin's finch, Geospiza fortes, and the cactus finch immigrant, Geospiza conirostris.
ref: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

Tra giugno e agosto di quest'anno, sarà la prima città dell'Europa sud-orientale a ospitare il più grande evento di arte pubblica del mondo, ovvero la CowParade.
mt: The event is also part of a campaign promoted by the city of Bucharest, which aims to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and lively metropolis. Between June and August of this year, it will be the first city in Southeast Europe to host the largest public art event in the world, namely the CowParade.
ref: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.
